To cut costs, all booking is done via the Internet and the pared-down cinemas have no popcorn stalls and skeleton staff

A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet announced Friday that it had finally acquired some films to show -- just a fortnight before it first opens
